content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Processing Facility at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Wooden Chest at Position (-14.5, -48.5)
- Stone Furnace at Position (-13.0, -48.0)
- Burner Inserter at Position (-14.5, -46.5)

### Coal Mining and Processing Facility at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at Position (41.0, -82.0)
- Wooden Chest at Position (41.5, -80.5)
- Stone Furnace at Position (43.0, -82.0)
- Burner Inserter at Position (43.5, -80.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items with insufficient inventory
- Ensure you have the required quantity of items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into an entity.

### Errors when placing entities in occupied or unsuitable tiles
- Verify that the target tile is unoccupied and suitable for the entity you wish to place. Consider adjusting the spacing, direction, or reference position if placement fails due to collisions or unsuitable terrain.

### Errors when refueling without sufficient fuel
- Check your inventory for sufficient fuel before attempting to refuel entities.
